page.title: 08 HOLIDAYS
page.content:
In July,1985, a survey of seventy people,representing a cross section of the local population, revealed the following information:_
1. Despite increased unemployment most people are planning an annual holiday.
2. Holiday attractions in order of popularity are:_ _ British resorts _ Foreign travel _ Occasional day trips.
3. The favoured holiday places, in Britain or abroad are seaside resorts, country areas and historic citys, respectively.
4. Most people arrange holidays of one or two weeks duration.
